```{r}
library(tidyverse)
yale_df <- read.csv("data/clean/yale.edu-directory.csv") %>% as_tibble
full_df <- readRDS("data/raw/property/full_df.RDS")
```
```{r}
yale_df$address <- 
  yale_df$address %>% 
  str_remove(", New Haven, CT") %>% 
  toupper() %>% 
  str_trim() %>% 
  str_replace("AVENUE", "AV") %>% 
  str_replace("STREET", "ST") %>% 
  str_replace("DRIVE", "DR") %>% 
  str_replace("PLACE", "PL")

yale_full <- full_df %>% dplyr::filter(grepl("YALE", owner))
```

```{r}
yale_full %>% 
  left_join(yale_df, by="address") %>% select(names, address, everything()) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  write.csv("data/clean/yale.edu-directory_with_names.csv", row.names=FALSE)
```
